From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

OK. found it, One of three things must have occured. I missed it and deleted
it accidentally, I was tired and slept through, or I was so overwhelmed by
OOC's that I passed it up thinking it was another one.

FZ nods, looking over the beasts once more.

"Yes. I must admit I wasn't expecting you to accomplish this."

He turns and walks toward the exit, the door opening. "Would you like a
shuttle
to get back to wherever you are from, or would you rather fly by yourself

Lady Hawk smiles for the first time in a while. Knowing that Shuttles could
be traced she decided leaving on her own would be her best bet. "I can fly
thank you." Soon as FZ had exited she gathered up the samples that Zardus
was kind enough to gather for her as well as a sample of DNA from each of
her creations and prepared to leave.

"Before I go though" she thought, "I'll give my creations a work out."
carefully the daughter of Veratis set a timer on the two force cages
surrounding the Aliens. "I should be half way home when these two come out
to play." she looked up toward the security camera. "I've programmed a
failsafe into the cages, if anything happens to me on the way out the DNA
will deteriorate making it useless to you." Lady Hawk stretched her wings
one more time before moving toward the door.
